forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sky unfurls in a brilliant display of sunshine, weaving its warm tapestry against the crisp clarity of the day. A gentle west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets, offering a refreshing contrast as temperatures dance around 65 degrees. Although the warmth is palpable, there's a cool undertone — a harbinger of the evening's approach, which softly beckons in shades of twilight.

As night falls, expect a steady transition to partly cloudy skies, where the gentle afterglow may serve as a perfect backdrop for evening strolls along the Embarcadero or a casual gathering at a local café. With the temperature dipping to around 55 degrees, a light jacket or sweater will complement the warm tones of the day. Consider taking a leisurely walk through the vibrant Mission District or exploring the hidden gems of North Beach; the lingering warmth of the day will still be lingering with you as the sounds of the city serenade the night.
